advancements.croparia.root.title: Croparia

advancements.croparia.croparia5.descript: Use potion of fire to upgrade Croparia T4 to Croparia T5
advancements.croparia.croparia6.title: Gaze into the abyss...
advancements.croparia.croparia6.descript: Use potion of air to upgrade Croparia T5 to Croparia T6
advancements.croparia.croparia7.title: ...and it gaze at you
advancements.croparia.croparia7.descript: Use potion of air to upgrade Croparia T6 to Croparia T7

advancements.croparia.gem_fire.descripti: Sacrifice magma block to obtain elemental fire
advancements.croparia.gem_water.title: Atlantis

advancements.croparia.gem_air.title: Whisper of the Wind
advancements.croparia.gem_air.descriptio: Sacrifice purpur block to obtain elemental air
advancements.croparia.gem_earth.title: Heart of the Land
advancements.croparia.gem_earth.descript: Sacrifice amethyst block to obtain elemental earth
advancements.croparia.potion_elemental.d: Use glass bottles to craft potion of elematilius
advancements.croparia.ritual_stand.title: Where the elements extracts

advancements.croparia.ritual_stand_3.des: Craft the ritual stand T3 to build the ritual structure T3
